body:
Comment 3 by **mikehenson**: 
/etc/paths.d/go does exist:

-rw-r--r--  1 root  wheel  18 Sep 19 18:51 /etc/paths.d/go

and contains:

-- begin contents --
/usr/local/go/bin
-- end contents --

I confirmed that the installer does create this file by manually removing
/etc/paths.d/go  and /usr/local/go, then executing the installer.
